alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Gilchrist; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gilchrist, southern Alachua and central Marion Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Bronson to near Ocala. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Fort McCoy, Citra, Lynne, Archer, Sparr, Anthony, Cross Creek, Micanopy and Reddick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Gilchrist; Western Alachua; Western Marion
